name: Mikaelf Saves Christmas
description:
Mikaelf Saves Christmas is about an Elf that... well, you get the jist.

Krampus has taken all of the joy from Kristmas City, and King Santa is powerless to stop him. Defeat his minions - the evil Kramplings - and make your way to defeat Krampus once and for all.

Made for the Secret Santa Game Jam 2021, for my giftee, Mike.

Credits:

Art, Sfx, Coding: Crusticus

Action RPG Tutorial(this game wouldn't have been made without it, so I'm giving credit where it's due): Shaun Spalding

Music: Andrey Sitkov. Tracks Used: Casual Theme #1, Fight Till Dying, Fight Till Dying (Slow Part), Medieval Theme 3
